title: Design System
subtitle: Enterprise component library & documentation
problem: An enterprise software company with 5 product teams was experiencing inconsistent UIs across products, duplicated component code, and slow feature development. Each team had their own button components, form inputs, and modals with different behaviors. Design reviews took hours because every team implemented designs differently. New developers spent weeks understanding component patterns.
solution: Built a comprehensive design system from scratch using React and TypeScript with Tailwind CSS for styling. Created 120+ production-ready components with full TypeScript support, accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA), and comprehensive documentation. Used Turborepo for monorepo management with separate packages for components, tokens, and utilities. Integrated Storybook with visual regression testing and automated documentation generation. Established contribution guidelines and version management strategy.
outcomes: Feature shipping speed increased by 3x across all product teams
